function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underreported cases of COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of uncontrolled spread of infection","Mitigation":"Increase testing and improve reporting systems","Technologies":"Improved testing technologies, data collection, and reporting systems","People":"Chinese population","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential resurgence of transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of control measures and population surveys","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, testing technologies","People":"Chinese population","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities"}]}
